-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | DSON parser.
--   
--   A parser for DSON strings built with parsec3.
@package dson-parsec
@version 0.4.1.1


-- | Some lexers for the rest of the library.
module Data.Dson.Lexer
symbol :: String -> ParsecT String u Identity String
stringLiteral :: ParsecT String u Identity String


-- | Parser for octal numbers.
module Data.Dson.Octal

-- | This parser can read a number in the following formats:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>5</li>
--   <li>-3.14</li>
--   <li>2very-6</li>
--   <li>1VERY4</li>
--   </ul>
--   
--   etc
octal :: Parser Double


-- | Provides the main DSON parser.
module Data.Dson.Parsec
data Dson
DSDict :: [(String, Dson)] -> Dson
DSArray :: [Dson] -> Dson
DSString :: String -> Dson
DSNumber :: Double -> Dson
Yes :: Dson
No :: Dson
Empty :: Dson

-- | This parser scans for either a DSON dict or array.
dsonTop :: Parser Dson
instance Show Dson
instance Eq Dson


-- | Provides serializers from Dson to Strings formats.
module Data.Dson.Serializer

-- | Takes a Dson value and turns it into a JSON string.
dsonToJson :: Dson -> String


-- | Main module. Has a test for the parser and the serializer.
module Data.Dson
run :: Parser Dson -> String -> IO ()

-- | Reads a DSON string, parses it to a Dson value and serializes it back
--   to JSON.
main :: IO ()
